t: Amazon Fresh Launches New Budget Friendly Brand, 'Amazon Saver' - Foodbeast
s: September 16, 2024 - Amazon Fresh is introducing a new private food label named Amazon Saver, and according to the announcement, the goal is to help “grocery budgets go further.” The private label will include general grocery essentials, crackers, cookies, canned fruit, condiments, and more.

t: Amazon unveils 'Saver' private-label grocery brand, escalating price wars with Walmart and Target – GeekWire
s: September 10, 2024 - The new private label brand, called Amazon Saver, is a “no-frills” brand with most items priced under $5. Prime members get an additional 10% off. Several products have already been rolled out and Amazon plans a selection of more than 100 items over time.

t: Amazon Fresh groceries are discounted for Prime members. Here's how it works. You decide if it's a good deal.
s: November 12, 2023 - Amazon Fresh stocks national and local brands, as well as its own store brands, including Happy Belly and Fresh brand.

t: Amazon Fresh Review: Pros, Cons, and How It Compares
s: August 31, 2022 - Not only does Amazon Fresh allow you to order items from Amazon brands — such as Happy Belly, Fresh Brand, and 365 by Whole Foods Market — but it also offers you access to a variety of products from local and national brands.

t: Amazon Fresh Grocery Shopping | Just Walk Out, Dash Cart & More - Amazon Customer Service

t: Amazon Fresh: What is it and How Does Amazon Fresh Work?
s: Amazon Fresh is the ecommerce giant’s grocery delivery and pickup service that provides customers with a convenient method to shop for essentials. Check out our guide to learn about what you need to do to become an Amazon Fresh seller in 2025.

t: Amazon Fresh drops the prices of over 200 products - Retail Gazette
